name: HOA LU - TAM COC (FULL DAY)
description: Just 110 km and 2.5 hours driving from Hanoi center, you have a chance to enjoy landscape in one of the most famous tourist province in the north of Vietnam. Most of backpacker chooses Ninh Binh as a stop-over for the trip through Vietnam. Among plenty of tourist sites such: Tam Coc – Ha Long bay on land, Cuc Phuong National Park, Van Long Floating Chanel, Trang An Eco...
